title: LFM for a serious and active team
body:
I am looking for 4 very active players who can be on every day to play as a team to smash out heaps of 5v5 ranked games. You must have a microphone and be able to use curse.

Requirements:
Turning 17+ this year
Microphone
very active
don't rage
Can stay positive during a game
Never surrender during a game
Willing to practice

I will be filling in whatever role is left so for now ALL ROLES ARE OPEN

top:
mid:
jungle:
adc:
support:

My IGN is whitepumah.

Please fill out this application form:

Age:

Microhpone: yes/no

Preferred role:

Top 3 champs in that role:

How many nights a week can you play for more than 4 hours:

replies.body: DON'T join this guys team he has been trying to make a ranked team since season 3 and has never managed to because he plays stupid things with adcs like tp twitch and builds bloodthirster first item on every champ, over 350 games on ashe and twitch last season and still bronze... dont join this guys team he is so toxic and will not listen to a word you have to say and thinks he knows everything about the game

Ign: damosstorm

age: 16 in july

microphone: yes

Preferred role: mid/jg

Top 3: Viktor, Nidalee, Zed/ Nidalee, Vi, Rek'sai

Usually every night i can fit 4 hours in (flexible) 

~Damian

Age: 18

Microhpone: yes

Preferred role: adc/mid

Top 3 champs in that role: katarina, vayne, jinx

How many nights a week can you play for more than 4 hours: most nights

Age: 16(17 later this year)

Microhpone: yes

Preferred role: JG
